short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blur out YouTube homepage feed to reduce distractions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Distraction Blocker: Enhance Your Productivity

Distraction Blocker is your ultimate companion for staying productive online. This Chrome extension empowers you to maintain focus by seamlessly blocking distractions on platforms like YouTube. With a simple toggle, switch between 'Focus Mode' to hide distracting content and 'Browsing Mode' to resume regular browsing. Stay in control of your online productivity with Distraction Blocker.

Key Features:

Toggle between 'Focus Mode' and 'Browsing Mode' effortlessly.
Enhance concentration by hiding distracting content on specified websites.
Customizable settings to fit your workflow and productivity needs.
Experience a distraction-free browsing environment and boost your productivity with Distraction Blocker today!
